basics.name: Koichiro Amakasu
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: I am a third-year student at Keio University, majoring in Commerce with a focus on econometrics. I will study abroad at the University of Hawaii at Manoa from Fall 2025 to Spring 2026, where I plan to take courses in computer science and broaden my international perspective. I also run a digital services company and have experience in web development, econometric analysis, and project management.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Founded and manage a digital services company providing web development and analytics solutions.
highlights: Built and deployed websites for research groups and local businesses
Automated reporting processes using Python and Google Cloud
Managed client communication and project delivery

volunteer.organization: Shiba Junior & Senior High School Wind Ensemble
volunteer.summary: Provided performance guidance to junior students.
